//: GRRADO Development Standards - Read .vscode/rulebook.md BEFORE making changes
[CRITICAL] ENFORCEMENT: All code MUST follow .vscode/rulebook.md standards - NO EXCEPTIONS

MandatoryReview: Section 1: Clean Architecture layers (Domain → Application → Infrastructure → API)
Section 3: Naming Conventions (kebab-case files, PascalCase classes)
Section 10: Versioning & Changelog (semantic versioning with lowercase major/minor/patch)

BEFORE_ANY_CHANGES: 2. VERIFY: Which layer does this change belong to? (Domain/Application/Infrastructure/API/Utility)
3. CHECK: Are you using constants or hard-coding values?
4. CONFIRM: Filenames use kebab-case, classes use PascalCase
5. VALIDATE: Does this follow Clean Architecture principles?
CRITICAL_RULES: ❌ ZERO HARD-CODING: Every literal must be a constant
✅ CLEAN_ARCHITECTURE: Code in correct layer only
✅ ASYNC_SUFFIX: Async methods end with Async (GetUserAsync)
✅ ERROR_CODES: Use ErrorCodes constants, never throw bare exceptions
✅ CORRELATION_ID: All public endpoints log with Correlation ID
✅ CONSTANTS: Use ApiEndpoints, AuthConstants, TimeoutConstants, ErrorCodes

// GRRADO CUSTOM.RulebookEnforcement: MANDATORY - All developers MUST read .vscode/rulebook.md before making ANY changes
// GRRADO CUSTOM.StandardsDocument: .vscode/rulebook.md is the SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH for all development standards
// GRRADO CUSTOM.VersioningStandard: Semantic versioning: major.minor.patch with lowercase version bump text (major/minor/patch)
// GRRADO CUSTOM.EnforcementMechanism: docs/pr-checklist.md - Mandatory code review with auto-rejection criteria

// GIT HOOKS - PR CHECKLIST ENFORCEMENT.PreCommitHook: .git/hooks/pre-commit - Validates code before committing (no hard-code, kebab-case files, no secrets)
// GIT HOOKS - PR CHECKLIST ENFORCEMENT.PrePushHook: .git/hooks/pre-push - Validates commits before pushing (no WIP commits, changelog exists)
// GIT HOOKS - PR CHECKLIST ENFORCEMENT.PRChecklistLocation: docs/pr-checklist.md - MANDATORY review before pushing to GitHub
AutomaticRejectionCriteria: 1. Hard-Coded Values - All literals must be extracted to Constants (❌ REJECTED)
2. File Naming Violations - All files must use kebab-case (❌ REJECTED)
3. Wrong Clean Architecture Layer - Code in correct layer only (❌ REJECTED)
4. Missing Async Suffix - Async methods must end with 'Async' (❌ REJECTED)
5. No XML Documentation - Public classes/methods must be documented (❌ REJECTED)
6. No Error Code Usage - Must use ErrorCodes constants, no bare exceptions (❌ REJECTED)
7. Missing Correlation ID - Public endpoints must log Correlation ID (❌ REJECTED)
// GIT HOOKS - PR CHECKLIST ENFORCEMENT.PRChecklistReminder: BEFORE PUSHING TO GITHUB: Verify all items in docs/pr-checklist.md
// GIT HOOKS - PR CHECKLIST ENFORCEMENT.ChangelogRequirement: Every PR MUST include changelog entry in docs/changelogs/ddmmyyyy.<seq>
// GIT HOOKS - PR CHECKLIST ENFORCEMENT.HookSetupInstructions: Git hooks installed in .git/hooks/ (Windows: .bat files, Unix: shell scripts)
